Requires assembling a frozen key. 		<0.1%

Reach Total Level 2277 Reach the highest possible Total Level of 2277. N/A 6.5%
Reach Base Level 95 Reach level 95 in every skill. N/A 7.0%

Dragon Slayer II 		0.8%

Enhance a Trident of the Seas Enhance a trident of the seas or Trident of the swamp. Requires 87 Slayer 0.9%
Equip an Expert Dragon Archer Chompy Hat Equip an expert dragon archer chompy hat. 4,000 chompy bird kills. 1.4%
Equip Every Godsword Equip all four godswords. 75 Attack 6.1%
Equip a Full Armadyl Armour Set Equip a full set of Armadyl armour. 70 Ranged, 70 Defence 11%

Obtain Every Revenant Weapon Obtain Craw's Bow, Viggora's Chainmace and Thammaron's Sceptre as drops from Revenants. N/A <0.1%
Equip an Amulet of Eternal Glory Equip an amulet of eternal glory. Completion of Heroes' Quest <0.1%
Equip a full set of Ancestral Equip an Ancestral Hat, an Ancestral robe top and an Ancestral robe bottom. 75 Magic, 65 Defence 0.1%
